label: 墾田永年資材法
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
見出し読み: こんでんえいねんしざいほう
説明文: the Law Concerning Permanent Possession of Reclaimed Land, which was promulgated in 743. It proclaimed that rice fields opened by individuals of certain status who utilized newly developed irrigation facilities and gained the permission of the provincial governor were to be considered perpetual hereditary holdings of the opener and his or her descendents.
